data.meta_description: Learn about Martin Clunes on AppleÂ TV. Browse shows and movies that include Martin Clunes, such as Doc Martin, Men Behaving Badly and more.
data.text:
Episode 1

Wildlife cameraman Hamza Yassin takes celebrities on explorations of Scotland's natural landscapes. Martin Clunes braves the elements, as he joins Hamza for an escape that brings back childhood memories as they go camping in the Inner Hebrides.

Martin Clunes, Jimmy Carr, Aisling Bea

Lee Mack is back with his hit panel show as guests Martin Clunes, Jimmy Carr, and Aisling Bea put more wacky, so-called facts to the ultimate test.

Episode 4

Joining Alan at Manor Farm are Eamonn Holmes, who is celebrating more than 40 years in broadcasting, and Martin Clunes, who discusses the return of everyone's favourite grumpy GP, Doc Martin. Meeting the cold climate dogs for whom winter is a mere breeze in the park. Florist Simon Lycette is back with simple yet innovative displays, and Burns Night has come early to the barn with the best in Scottish tipples ahead of the big day.

Best of

A look back at some of the most memorable moments to come out of series six, packed with astounding trivia, wacky experiments, big laughs, and plenty of celebrity guests.
